pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenTelemetry Distro====================|pypi|.. |pypi| image:: https://badge.fury.io/py/opentelemetry-distro.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/opentelemetry-distro/Installation------------:: pip install opentelemetry-distroThis package provides entrypoints to configure OpenTelemetry.References----------* `OpenTelemetry Project <https://opentelemetry.io/>`_* `Example using opentelemetry-distro <https://opentelemetry.io/docs/instrumentation/python/distro/>`_
